price: 45 Moïse et Aaron dirent : « Nous craignons Seigneur qu’il ne s’empresse de nous châtier ou qu’il nous traite injustement. »
arabic: قَالَا رَبَّنَآ إِنَّنَا نَخَافُ أَن يَفۡرُطَ عَلَيۡنَآ أَوۡ أَن يَطۡغَىٰ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qālā rabbanā innanā nakhāfu an yafruṭa ʿalaynā aw an yaṭghā
